verses.verse: Let love <S%G5360><s%> of the brethren <S%G5360><s%> continue. <S%G3306><s%>

Do not neglect <S%G1950><s%> to show hospitality <S%G5381><s%> to strangers, <S%G5381><s%> for by this <S%G3778><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> have entertained <S%G3579><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> without <S%G2990><s%> knowing <S%G2990><s%> it.

Remember <S%G3403><s%> the prisoners, <S%G1198><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> in prison <S%G4887><s%> with them, and those <S%G3588><s%> who are ill-treated, since <S%G5613><s%> you yourselves <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are in the body. <S%G4983><s%>

[Let] marriage <S%G1062><s%> [be held] in honor <S%G5093><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> and let the [marriage] bed <S%G2845><s%> [be] undefiled; <S%G283><s%> for fornicators <S%G4205><s%> and adulterers <S%G3432><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will judge. <S%G2919><s%>

Let your character <S%G5158><s%> be free <S%G866><s%> from the love <S%G866><s%> of money, <S%G866><s%> being content <S%G714><s%> with what you have; <S%G3918><s%> for He Himself <S%G846><s%> has said, <S%G3004><s%> "I will never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> desert <S%G447><s%> you, nor <S%G3761><s%> will I ever <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> forsake <S%G1459><s%> you,"

so <S%G5620><s%> that we confidently <S%G2292><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> "The Lord <S%G2962><s%> is my helper, <S%G998><s%> I will not be afraid. <S%G5399><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> shall man <S%G444><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> to me?"

Remember <S%G3421><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who led <S%G2233><s%> you, who <S%G3748><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to you; and considering <S%G333><s%> the result <S%G1545><s%> of their conduct, <S%G391><s%> imitate <S%G3401><s%> their faith. <S%G4102><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> [is] the same <S%G846><s%> yesterday <S%G7088><s%> and today, <S%G4594><s%> [yes] and forever. <S%G165><s%>

Do not be carried <S%G3911><s%> away <S%G3911><s%> by varied <S%G4164><s%> and strange <S%G3581><s%> teachings; <S%G1322><s%> for it is good <S%G2570><s%> for the heart <S%G2588><s%> to be strengthened <S%G950><s%> by grace, <S%G5485><s%> not by foods, <S%G1033><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were thus <S%G4043><s%> occupied <S%G4043><s%> were not benefited. <S%G5623><s%>

We have <S%G2192><s%> an altar, <S%G2379><s%> from which <S%G3739><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who serve <S%G3000><s%> the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> right <S%G1849><s%> to eat. <S%G2068><s%>

For the bodies <S%G4983><s%> of those <S%G3778><s%> animals <S%G2226><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> is brought <S%G1533><s%> into the holy <S%G40><s%> place <S%G40><s%> by the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> [as an offering] for sin, <S%G266><s%> are burned <S%G2618><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> the camp. <S%G3925><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> that He might sanctify <S%G37><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> His own <S%G2398><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> the gate. <S%G4439><s%>
Hence, <S%G5106><s%> let us go <S%G1831><s%> out to Him outside <S%G1854><s%> the camp, <S%G3925><s%> bearing <S%G5342><s%> His reproach. <S%G3680><s%>
For here <S%G5602><s%> we do not have <S%G2192><s%> a lasting <S%G3306><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> but we are seeking <S%G1934><s%> [the city] which is to come. <S%G3195><s%>

Through <S%G1223><s%> Him then, <S%G3767><s%> let us continually <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3956><s%> offer <S%G399><s%> up a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> of praise <S%G133><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> that is, the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of lips <S%G5491><s%> that give <S%G3670><s%> thanks <S%G3670><s%> to His name. <S%G3686><s%>
And do not neglect <S%G1950><s%> doing <S%G2140><s%> good <S%G2140><s%> and sharing; <S%G2842><s%> for with such <S%G5108><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is pleased. <S%G2100><s%>

Obey <S%G3982><s%> your leaders, <S%G2233><s%> and submit <S%G5226><s%> [to them]; for they keep <S%G69><s%> watch <S%G69><s%> over <S%G5228><s%> your souls, <S%G5590><s%> as those who will give <S%G591><s%> an account. <S%G3056><s%> Let them do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> with joy <S%G5479><s%> and not with grief, <S%G4727><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> would be unprofitable <S%G255><s%> for you.

Pray <S%G4336><s%> for us, for we are sure <S%G3982><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> desiring <S%G2309><s%> to conduct <S%G390><s%> ourselves honorably <S%G2573><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things. <S%G3956><s%>
And I urge <S%G3870><s%> [you] all <S%G4053><s%> the more <S%G4053><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> that I may be restored <S%G600><s%> to you the sooner. <S%G5036><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace, <S%G1515><s%> who brought <S%G321><s%> up from the dead <S%G3498><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> Shepherd <S%G4166><s%> of the sheep <S%G4263><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the eternal <S%G166><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%> [even] Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord, <S%G2962><s%>

equip <S%G2675><s%> you in every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing <S%G18><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> His will, <S%G2307><s%> working <S%G4160><s%> in us that which <S%G2101><s%> is pleasing <S%G2101><s%> in His sight, <S%G1799><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> [be] the glory <S%G1391><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

But I urge <S%G3870><s%> you, brethren, <S%G80><s%> bear <S%G430><s%> with this <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of exhortation, <S%G3874><s%> for I have written <S%G1989><s%> to you briefly. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G1024><s%>

Take <S%G1097><s%> notice <S%G1097><s%> that our brother <S%G80><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> has been released, <S%G630><s%> with whom, <S%G3739><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he comes <S%G2064><s%> soon, <S%G5036><s%> I shall see <S%G3708><s%> you.
Greet <S%G782><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of your leaders <S%G2233><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the saints. <S%G40><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> from Italy <S%G2482><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you.
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%>
